Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    play.cache.caffeine.CaffeineDefaultExpiry
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. This is an implementation detail and it was not supposed to be public.
    play.data.validation.ValidatorProvider
    Deprecated since 2.7.0. Use ValidatorFactoryProvider instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    play.mvc.Http.Headers.addHeader(String, List<String>)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.Headers.adding(String, List) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Headers.addHeader(String, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.Headers.adding(String, String) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Session.apply(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.Session.get(String) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Flash.apply(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.Flash.get(String) instead.
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asByteArray()
    Use response.getBodyAsBytes().toArray()
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asJson()
    Use response.getBody(json())
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asXml()
    Use response.getBody(xml())
    play.libs.Files.TemporaryFile.atomicMoveFileWithFallback(File)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to Files.TemporaryFile.atomicMoveWithFallback(File).
    play.libs.Files.DelegateTemporaryFile.atomicMoveFileWithFallback(File)
    play.libs.Files.TemporaryFile.atomicMoveFileWithFallback(Path)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to Files.TemporaryFile.atomicMoveWithFallback(Path).
    play.mvc.Results.badRequest(File, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.badRequest(File, Optional).
    play.mvc.Results.badRequest(File, String, FileMimeTypes)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.badRequest(File, Optional, FileMimeTypes).
    play.data.DynamicForm.bind(Lang, TypedMap, JsonNode, String...)
    play.data.Form.bind(Lang, TypedMap, JsonNode, String...)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.3. Use Form.bind(Lang, TypedMap, JsonNode, long, String...) instead to specify the maximum chars that should be consumed by the flattened form representation of the JSON.
    play.mvc.Http.RequestBuilder.bodyMultipart(List<Http.MultipartFormData.Part<Source<ByteString, ?>>>, Files.TemporaryFileCreator, Materializer)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Renamed to Http.RequestBuilder.bodyRaw(List, Files.TemporaryFileCreator, Materializer).
    play.core.j.MappedJavaHandlerComponents.contextComponents()
    play.test.Helpers.contextComponents()
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Inject MessagesApi, Langs, FileMimeTypes or HttpConfiguration instead
    play.mvc.Http.RequestHeader.cookie(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.RequestHeader.getCookie(String) instead.
    play.mvc.Results.created(File, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.created(File, Optional).
    play.mvc.Results.created(File, String, FileMimeTypes)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.created(File, Optional, FileMimeTypes).
    play.Logger.debug(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.debug(String, Object...)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.debug(String, Supplier<?>...)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.debug(String, Throwable)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.
    play.Logger.debug(Supplier<String>)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.

    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Create an instance of Logger.ALogger via Logger.of(String) / Logger.of(Class) and use the same-named method. Or use SLF4J directly.

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.forbidden(File, Optional).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use to Results.forbidden(File, Optional, FileMimeTypes).
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.getAllHeaders()
    Deprecated since 2.6.0. Use AhcWSResponse.getHeaders() instead.
    play.libs.ws.WSResponse.getAllHeaders()
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.getBodyAsStream()
    Use response.getBody(inputStream())
    play.libs.ws.WSResponse.getBodyAsStream()
    use getBody(BodyReadable) with WSBodyWritables.inputStream().

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to AsyncCacheApi.get(String).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Renamed to SyncCacheApi.get(String).

    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use Http.RequestHeader.queryString(String) instead.
    play.DefaultApplication.getWrappedApplication()
    play.Application.getWrappedApplication()
    Use Application.asScala() instead.

    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. WebCommands are now handled by the DefaultHttpRequestHandler.

    use addHeader(name, value)

    use WSRequest.addHeader(String, String)

    Use addQueryParameter

    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.setRequestTimeout(long)
    use WSRequest.setRequestTimeout(Duration)

  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    play.DefaultApplication(Application, Config, Injector)
    Use DefaultApplication(play.api.Application, Config, Injector, Environment) instead.
    play.mvc.BodyParser.DelegatingMultipartFormDataBodyParser(Materializer, long, HttpErrorHandler)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use DelegatingMultipartFormDataBodyParser(Materializer, long, long, HttpErrorHandler) instead.
    play.db.jpa.DefaultJPAApi.JPAApiProvider(JPAConfig, ApplicationLifecycle, DBApi, Config)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use JPAApiProvider(JPAConfig, ApplicationLifecycle, DBApi) instead.
    play.core.j.MappedJavaHandlerComponents(ActionCreator, HttpConfiguration, ExecutionContext, JavaContextComponents)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use constructor without JavaContextComponents
    play.mvc.Http.RequestImpl(RequestHeader)
    Since 2.7.0. Use RequestImpl(play.api.mvc.Request) instead.
    play.routing.RoutingDsl(BodyParser.Default, JavaContextComponents)
    Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Use constructor without JavaContextComponents
